name: Wizard Run
description:
Wizard Run - GGJ 2016

Description

A game created for global game jam 2016, theme was RITUAL. The game is a endless runner where the player must jump over spikes and shoot spiders and try to survive as long as possible.

The player also collects gems that are broken down into magic essence, once the player collects 3 gems of the same type the player can cast a powerful spell. 

Controls

Alt   - to fire
Ctrl   - to jump
Up/ Down arrows - to cycle through spells
Space - to cast the spell 
Alt F4 - to exit

Credits

Sean Maguire  - Programming/ Design
Stephen Lane  - Programming/ Design
Robert Crosby - 3D art/ Design
